short_summary: Ability to cast vision and guide a group toward God-honoring goals.
full_definition: The spiritual capacity to influence, motivate, and direct people toward the fulfillment of God’s purposes with clarity, integrity, and steady faith.

short_summary: Care for and nurture spiritual growth of others.
full_definition: A God-given desire and grace to provide ongoing spiritual encouragement, protection, guidance, and nurturing for a group of believers.

short_summary: Recognize truth versus error or deception.
full_definition: The Spirit-enabled ability to distinguish between truth and falsehood, authentic and counterfeit spiritual influences, motives, or teachings.

short_summary: Encourage, strengthen, and motivate others.
full_definition: Capacity to come alongside individuals offering counsel, comfort, correction, and motivational support toward Christlike maturity.

short_summary: Create welcoming spaces that reflect God’s love.
full_definition: A Spirit-empowered openness and warmth that makes others—strangers or believers—feel accepted, safe, and valued within Christian community.

short_summary: Boldly declare truth for building up.
full_definition: Ability to communicate timely, God-aligned truth that convicts, encourages, or guides, always consistent with Scripture.

short_summary: Understand and synthesize Biblical truth.
full_definition: A Spirit-enabled grasp of the depth, coherence, and interconnections of God’s revelation that aids teaching and application.

short_summary: God works unusually through your prayers or actions.
full_definition: Occurrences beyond natural explanation that God initiates in response to faith, often validating the gospel or strengthening believers.

short_summary: God restores through your intercession or presence.
full_definition: Channels God’s compassionate power for physical, emotional, or spiritual restoration, pointing people to Christ the Healer.

short_summary: Joyfully assist to free others for their ministry focus.
full_definition: Consistent willingness and capacity to support others with practical service that enhances the effectiveness of kingdom work.

short_summary: Deep empathy and compassionate action toward the hurting.
full_definition: Spirit-driven sensitivity to suffering with tangible expressions of comfort, hope, and redemptive presence.

short_summary: Communicate the gospel clearly and compellingly.
full_definition: Effectiveness and zeal in sharing the good news so that others understand their need for Christ and respond in faith.

short_summary: Unusual confidence in God’s promises and power.
full_definition: Persistent trust that God will accomplish what He reveals despite obstacles, inspiring others to rely on Him boldly.

short_summary: Explain and apply Scripture with clarity.
full_definition: Capacity to interpret, organize, and communicate biblical truth accurately so learners grow in knowledge and obedience.

short_summary: Apply truth to complex real-life choices.
full_definition: Spirit-enabled insight that discerns God-honoring courses of action in ambiguous or multi-factor situations.

short_summary: Persistent, focused prayer on behalf of others.
full_definition: A sustained burden and perseverance in prayer that aligns with God’s heart and sees strategic breakthroughs.

short_summary: Meet practical needs with reliability and humility.
full_definition: Spirit-prompted readiness to identify and fulfill essential tasks that sustain and strengthen gospel ministry.

short_summary: Spirit-led utterance and/or interpretation that edifies.
full_definition: Expression of prayer or praise in languages unknown to the speaker with orderly interpretation for the body’s strengthening (where practiced).

short_summary: Cheerfully and sacrificially resource kingdom work.
full_definition: Spirit-enabled motivation to release material resources with unusual generosity, strategic focus, and joy.

short_summary: Cross cultural or contextual boundaries for the gospel.
full_definition: Capacity and zeal to adapt, incarnate, and persist in unfamiliar contexts to establish or strengthen gospel witness.

short_summary: Pioneer, architect, or extend new gospel works.
full_definition: Vision and endurance to initiate, establish, or expand missional structures or communities where foundation is weak or absent.

short_summary: Skillfully build or create tangible ministry assets.
full_definition: Artistic or technical ability applied to produce, repair, or enhance physical or digital tools that support ministry impact.

short_summary: Organize, systematize, and coordinate effectively.
full_definition: Spirit-enabled structuring of processes, people, and resources so that mission objectives are pursued with clarity and efficiency.

short_summary: Lead others into authentic, God-focused worship.
full_definition: Capacity to combine musical, lyrical, or production gifting with spiritual sensitivity to help people encounter and glorify God.
